name: Cube (itch) (NnYGames)
description:
You play as a cube and your goal is to reach the end of the level without crashing into obstacles. If you finish levels quickly, you will gain stars, that can get you skins and upgrades. Try to get 3 stars on all levels.

Multiple changes were done to make the game easier to play and adapt, like adding settings to change the acceleration and diversion rate. 

There is now an official installer.
